title.rendered: Podcast Capsule : “L’entrepreneur ESS est-il un entrepreneur comme un autre ?”

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||98px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

 

[Podcast #ESS] Table-ronde animée par Mme Audrey ROYER, animatrice et directrice de Podcast Sexistu, sur le thème de :

 “L’entrepreneur ESS est-il un entrepreneur comme un autre ?“

Pour y répondre, trois invités :

M Jean-Michel MINICONI, directeur de la CRESS Corsica

M Patrice PELLEGRIN, directeur de l’association ACI Falepa Corsica

Mme Linda GENDRE, directrice administrative de la M3E

Découvrez le podcast :

https://www.facebook.com/reel/3587982011530020

 

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://cress.corsica/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Image-Table-ronde-ESS_17.10.223.jpeg” _builder_version=”4.14.8″ _module_preset=”default” theme_builder_area=”post_content” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ theme_builder_area=”post_content” _builder_version=”4.14.8″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.8″ _module_preset=”default” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.14.8″ _module_preset=”default” theme_builder_area=”post_content” type=”4_4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
